title: Database helps vulnerable adults (Calderdale Metropolitan Borough Council)
text: ( Source : Calderdale Metropolitan Borough Council ) A system created by Calderdale Council to help manage adult social care records has received an official seal of approval as Leeds Council has started using the software. In 2004 Calderdale
